official-title.#text:
To require the Secretary of Agriculture to report on the
		  cost differences between providing school meals and supplements in each of the
		  territories of the United States and the 50 States and the District of
		  Columbia, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced

Committee on Education and the
			 Workforce
